Package soot.baf

Class BafASMBackend

  • java.lang.Object
    • soot.AbstractASMBackend
      • soot.baf.BafASMBackend
  • public class BafASMBackend
extends AbstractASMBackend
    Concrete ASM based bytecode generation backend for the BAF intermediate representation
    Author:
    Tobias Hamann, Florian Kuebler, Dominik Helm, Lukas Sommer, Alex Bertram, Andreas Dann

      Writes out the information stored in tags associated with the given unit

      Returns the ASM Label for a given Unit that is the target of a branch or jump
      protected int getMinJavaVersion​(SootMethod method)
      Determines the minimum Java version required for the bytecode of the given SootMethod Subclasses should override this method to suit their needs, otherwise Java 1.7 is assumed for compatibility with invokeDynamic

    • Constructor Detail

      • BafASMBackend

        public BafASMBackend​(SootClass sc,
                     int javaVersion)
        Creates a new BafASMBackend with a given enforced java version
        Parameters:
        sc - The SootClass the bytecode is to be generated for
        javaVersion - A particular Java version enforced by the user, may be 0 for automatic detection, must not be lower than necessary for all features used

    • Method Detail

        Parameters:
        target - The unit that is the branch target
        Returns:
        The Label that specifies this unit

      • getMinJavaVersion

        protected int getMinJavaVersion​(SootMethod method)
        Description copied from class: AbstractASMBackend
        Determines the minimum Java version required for the bytecode of the given SootMethod Subclasses should override this method to suit their needs, otherwise Java 1.7 is assumed for compatibility with invokeDynamic
        Overrides:
        getMinJavaVersion in class AbstractASMBackend
        Parameters:
        method - The SootMethod the minimum Java version is to be determined for
        Returns:
        The minimum Java version required for the given SootMethod

        Emits the bytecode for a single Baf instruction
